extendedInfo.description: Can you solve this fun Animal Mix and Match puzzle? Use the "MIX" Button in each scene and see what happens. Puzzling is fun! Start exploring now! A simple and fun shape matching game and puzzle for kids and toddlers. You solve the puzzle by completing the four animals that fit the shapes at the bottom of the scene. Switch the scene from 2 to 3 pieces puzzles by using the button on the upper right corner. This app offers high-quality illustrations, funny effects and sounds - all just waiting to be discovered.Features of Animal Mix and Match Puzzle for children: - 4 different themes (fish, wild animals, ocean life, dinosaurs) - Mix & Match option for 2 or 3 pieces puzzles (switch the scene by clicking the button on the upper right corner) - The puzzles are randomized on each play - Cute and kid-friendly graphics and sounds - Pop the ballons game at the end of a successful game A great matching game and puzzle for toddlers! When your kid loves shape puzzles, match it, mix and match and shape matching game, your kids will love this one too!One scene (sea life: fish) of this Animal Mix and Match puzzle is completely free, the other levels can be easily unlocked in-game.Three more scenes (wild animals, ocean life and dinosaurs) can be unlocked in-game. A modern flip-book game app for kids!When your kids love Shape Matching Puzzles, Mixer Apps and Mix and Match Puzzles, this is just the perfect game app for them!Keywords: baby, brain, child, concentration, coordination, dino, easy, elephant, eye, find, fish, hand, hippo, life, lion, logic, memory, mixer, nemo, ocean, pairs, preschool, quiz, riddle, school, shape, shark, trainer, wild, autism
